Comments_List: I gained a broad range of information about different topics related to reproduction. The course was a great introduction to the topic, and I feel like I have a good idea of much of the relevant literature.

I liked the way this course was designed as a seminar, with student discussion as the primary way of covering the topics. One weakness of the course was its size - I know that it was oversubscribed and even this size involved turning many students away, but I think a slightly smaller group might have better facilitated the discussions.
The greatest strength of this course was the quality of the discussions and readings.
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course to another student. If they are at all interested in the topic, this course gave a great overview of many different issues on reproduction.
This course challenged the way that I think about the influence of culture on reproduction. I would absolutely recommend this course to another student.
